languages.text: Автоматон пострадал от неизвестной поломки и напал на людей. Обезумевшее творение нужно остановить!

traits.locale_text: Дикая тварь, которую держат в клетке для развлечения, вырвалась на свободу. Взбешенную тварь нужно остановить!
Автоматон пострадал от неизвестной поломки и напал на людей. Обезумевшее творение нужно остановить!

languages.text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!
languages.original_text: Автоматон пострадал от неизвестной поломки и напал на людей. Обезумевшее творение нужно остановить!

traits.locale_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!
An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!
A wild xenobeast held in a cage for amusement has escaped. The rampaging creature needs to be stopped!
A wild xenobeast held in a cage for amusement has escaped. The rampaging creature needs to be stopped!
An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!
An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

languages.text: Ein Automat hat eine unbekannte Fehlfunktion und attackiert nun Personen. Die defekte Maschine muss gestoppt werden!
languages.original_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

traits.locale_text: Ein Automat hat eine unbekannte Fehlfunktion und attackiert nun Personen. Die defekte Maschine muss gestoppt werden!

languages.text: Pour des raisons inexpliquées, un automate a déraillé et s'attaque à présent à tout ce qui bouge. Ce tas de ferraille doit être mis hors d'état de nuire !
languages.original_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

traits.locale_text: Une xénobête sauvage détenue à des fins de divertissement s'est échappée. Cette créature est en train de faire un massacre, il faut l'arrêter !

languages.text: 一台机仆发生了未知故障，正在袭击船员。必须阻止这台发了疯的机器！
languages.original_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

traits.locale_text: 原本被关在笼子里供娱乐用的异兽逃出了笼子，必须阻止那头狂暴的野兽！

languages.text: オートマトンが謎の不具合に見舞われて、人々を襲っている。この狂気の機械を止めなければ！
languages.original_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

traits.locale_text: オートマトンが謎の不具合に見舞われて、人々を襲っている。この狂気の機械を止めなければ！

languages.text: Un autómata ha sufrido un error desconocido y ataca a la gente. ¡Hay que detener esta máquina descontrolada!
languages.original_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

traits.locale_text: Una xenobestia salvaje enjaulada por diversión ha escapado. ¡Hay que detener a esa criatura!

languages.text: Nedeni bilinmeyen bir sebeple arıza yapan bir otomaton, insanlara saldırıyor. Bozuk makineyi durdurmak şart!
languages.original_text: An automaton has suffered an unknown malfunction and is now attacking people. The deranged machine must be stopped!

traits.locale_text: Nedeni bilinmeyen bir sebeple arıza yapan bir otomaton, insanlara saldırıyor. Bozuk makineyi durdurmak şart!
